== How to use this template to create your own project? ==

  
 1.) Open VS 2010 -> File -> New -> Project -> Visual C#-> !SharePoint -> 2010 -> Select Template <br/> 
	http://visual-studio-sharepoint-project-template.googlecode.com/svn/Usage1.png 
 <br>
 2.) Provide Name and select Location and click OK. It will create project as per you input as mentioned in below screen shot <br/> 
    http://visual-studio-sharepoint-project-template.googlecode.com/svn/Usage2.png
 <br>

 3.) Do you changes and Set your Site URL in {ProjectName!}.UI properties as in below screen shots
http://visual-studio-sharepoint-project-template.googlecode.com/svn/Properties.png
<br>

 4.) Right click on solution name and click on Deploy from the context menu to deploy the solution
http://visual-studio-sharepoint-project-template.googlecode.com/svn/Deploy.png


5. To validate deployment [http://code.google.com/p/visual-studio-sharepoint-project-template/wiki/PostDeploymentSteps Verify Post Deployment steps]
